name: Emma
description: Imagine you are walking in the metaverse listening to your favourite songs in the physical world. An AI Visual Dj matches visuals to your songs and displays them to your digital items. You could express your emotions without saying a word. A new way of communicating in the digital world :) The moving print was live coded by web developer Carolyn Olaguivel with a program called Hydra. She recorded it while she played a DJ set by Weisser Rabe.
